title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.2 build 9 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 17:59 编辑 

测试版是Minecraft 基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的领域服务器不兼容，不提供支持。Minecraft 基岩版 1.2 正式版 仍未发布， build 9 为其第 9 个测试版转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。Version: 1.2.0.31
版本号 1.2.0.31

New Features:
新特性
Coordinates! Now available as a gamerule and a toggle under settings.坐标！现在可以作为游戏规则使用，在设置页面中可以修改Copy world button is now next to "delete world" and "export world" (Xbox only)复制世界按钮现在在删除世界和导出世界的旁边了(仅Xbox版)

Tweaks:
调整:
Added a per entity type limit that only affects creepers and ghasts so they won't spawn if there's already a certain number in a 5x5 chunk area- no more overspawning of creepers & ghasts!增加针对爬行者和恶魂的实体生成限制，现在5x5区块之内不会过多生成这些生物了Removed upload custom skin button in Xbox One beta until the console platforms complete the work to allow uploading of skins to the console.移除Xbox One版的上传自定义皮肤按钮，直到主机平台完成允许上传自定义皮肤的工作后才会重新添加Recipe book visibility status now saved separately for inventory & crafting背包与合成界面配方书的状态分隔存储了Tweaked entity counting to improve performance调整实体计数，改善性能Tweaked the UI in the settings screen调整设置界面的UIChanged the highlight slot image and adjusted layering to have it under the item改变物品槽的高亮图片，将其覆盖层调整至物品下面

Fixes from Bugs in Beta:
修复Beta版本的bug:
Items are no longer deselected when the virtual keyboard closes当虚拟键盘关闭时物品不会被取消选中了Fixed a crash associated with storage修复存储方面一个会使游戏崩溃的bugFixed a crash when the host leaves the session while in split-screen修复玩家在分隔屏幕的状态下离开会话游戏崩溃的bugFixed a crash when traveling through the End portal while the inventory window is open修复当背包界面打开时进入下界传送门游戏崩溃的bugPlayers can again switch between skins from the same skin/mash-up pack玩家现在又能在相同皮肤包中切换皮肤了Creepers should always explode now and won't stop exploding just because you hit them爬行者在你击打它们时不会停止充能了Can no longer attach blocks (like torches) to cocoa beans方块(例如火把)不能连接到可可豆上了Fixed auto selecting after crafting to select the correct item修复合成后自动选中物品功能，现在可以选中正确的物品了Fixed some world conversion bugs修复世界会话的一些bugNo more crashes when attempting to use the skin picker with the Korean language selected选中韩语时使用皮肤选择器游戏不会崩溃了Totem of Undying now protects you from fall damage不死图腾也会在你受到摔落伤害时保护你了Fixed a crash on Win 10 devices running an older Win 10 update修复Win10设备系统版本过久导致的崩溃问题Players are no longer transferred back to the play menu when attempting to connect via split-screen in a multiplayer game在尝试分屏幕连接到多人游戏中时，玩家不会退回到游玩界面了Fixed a crash when a player loaded a custom superflat world with the player located close to an Ocean Monument修复玩家读取自定义超平坦世界，若接近海底神殿会崩溃的bugPlayers won't mine blocks anymore when using the touch-and-hold method to use a held item玩家在长按使用持有的物品时不会去破坏方块了Fixed a crash when a player used an Ender pearl to teleport through an End gateway in a converted world修复转换后的世界中，玩家使用末影珍珠进入末地折跃门会导致游戏崩溃的bugConverted worlds with DLC applied again have the DLC applied when downloaded to another console on the same XBL account使用相同XBL账号下载到另一平台的转换后的世界也会应用DLC了Splash text no longer pulses really quickly when cancelling out of a level load在取消世界读取时文本不会跳动地很快了HUD opacity now changes to max for ~5 seconds and fades back to what you have set in options after changing hotbar slotsHUD不透明度在改变后的5秒中内，如果你切换快捷栏的话会退回原先的设置Players should now get more correct messaging when blocked on connecting to a partner server在连接到玩家被加入黑名单的合作服务器时，玩家会收到更多有关消息了Players can now reenter partner servers without having to restart the game (Android only)玩家现在不需要重启游戏就能重新进入合作服务器了(仅安卓版)Drift has been reduced in creative flight mode and players won't drop out of flight by touching the ground.减少创造模式飞行时的随意度，玩家不会因为点击地面就取消飞行了Descending with the right joystick in creative mode is no longer super slow (Xbox only)使用右摇杆在创造模式下减少飞行高度的速度不会那么慢了(仅Xbox版)No more blank profiles on Xbox Live profilesXbox Live的介绍不再有很多项为空了Fixed a crash that occurred after changing players修复更换玩家后出现的崩溃问题Players again start with items in their inventory in creative mode玩家在开始创造模式时背包中又会有物品了If the hotbar is full and a player selects a creative item, it picks up the item and moves focus to the hotbar如果快捷栏已满，玩家选中了创造物品，物品会被选中，移动到快捷栏Fixed some chat bugs修复一些聊天bugOff-hand items can be removed again副手的物品再次可以被移除了Game no longer freezes on the "saving world" message if the player signs out of their profile while in a world如果玩家在世界中时登出，游戏不会卡在“保存世界中”界面上了

Fixes from Bugs in Retail:
修复零售版本的bug:
Cake now has a stack size of 64蛋糕可以堆叠64个了/execute…detect now has the right position offsets/execute ... detect 的坐标偏移量现在正确了
